name: Ogbomoso
description: Designers unite through shared passion for creativity and innovation, exchanging ideas that push boundaries. Together they critique, collaborate, and elevate each other's work beyond individual limitations.
content:
dSandBox is a global design community ecosystem created to empower designers through creativity, connection, and collaboration.


We bring designers together – from students to professionals - to learn, share ideas, and grow collectively through community events, workshops, and creative challenges.


Starting from Ogbomoso, Nigeria, one of the fastest-rising tech and innovation hubs in the South-West, dSandBox is building local communities that connect to a larger global network of designers.

events.title: Ogbomoso Design Fest
events.description: Hands-on sessions with industry experts to sharpen your design skills and learn new techniques.

events.title: Ogbomoso Design Fest
events.description: Get constructive feedback on your portfolio from experienced designers and hiring managers.

events.title: Ogbomoso Design Fests
events.description: Connect with fellow designers, developers, and creatives in your local community.

events.title: Ogbomoso Design Fest
events.description: Work on real-world projects with team members and build your experience together.
